detectors.description: NedCoin.random() (NedCoin.sol#231-235) uses a weak PRNG: random_num (NedCoin.sol#234)
NedCoin.random() (NedCoin.sol#231-235) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random_num = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(now,msg.sender,rand_nonce))) % deathChance (NedCoin.sol#232)
